com.jaxio.celerio.configuration

Class EntityContextProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaxio.celerio.configuration.EntityContextProperty

  • public class EntityContextProperty
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to introduce a new 'namer' property on each Celerio's entity context instance. Entity namer properties are convenient when writing template for classes that support entities, for example: Controller, Service, Dao, Validator etc... example: var name is obtained with ${entity.property.var} and has the value "prefixEntityNameSuffix".
